infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: JNPSharjah uses the camera to capture and upload user profile image and Listing Image to the server.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: JNPSharjah needs access to the photo library to select and upload user profile image and Listing Image to the server.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: JNPSharjah needs access to the photo library to select and upload user profile image and Listing Image to the server.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: JNPSharjah usages device location on listing information, Listing search Data and User information.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: JNPSharjah usages device location on listing information, Listing search Data and User information.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: JNPSharjah uses device location on listing information, Listing search Data and User information.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: JNPSharjah uses your microphone while taking video of your product for uploading in listing information.

plugins.photosPermission: JNPSharjah needs access to the photo library to select and upload user profile image and Listing Image to the server.
plugins.cameraPermission: JNPSharjah uses the camera to capture and upload user profile image and Listing Image to the server.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: JNPSharjah usages device location on listing information, Listing search Data and User information.

plugins.faceIDPermission: Allow JNPSharjah to access your Face ID biometric data.
